articles.description: The San Luis Obispo County Public Health Department removed one case of COVID-19 Sunday as they were a resident of Santa Barbara County. The updated countywide total is now 258.
articles.content:
The San Luis Obispo County Public Health Department removed one case of COVID-19 Sunday as they were a resident of Santa Barbara County. The updated countywide total is now 258.
